location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

provisioningState.Description: Gets the provisioning state of the Just-in-Time policy.

id.Description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.Description: Port configurations for the virtual machine

publicIpAddress.Description: Public IP address of the Azure Firewall that is linked to this policy, if applicable

allowedSourceAddressPrefix.Description: Mutually exclusive with the "allowedSourceAddressPrefixes" parameter. Should be an IP address or CIDR, for example "192.168.0.3" or "192.168.0.0/16".

maxRequestAccessDuration.Description: Maximum duration requests can be made for. In ISO 8601 duration format. Minimum 5 minutes, maximum 1 day

startTimeUtc.Description: The start time of the request in UTC

requestor.Description: The identity of the person who made the request

justification.Description: The justification for making the initiate request

id.Description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.Description: The ports that were opened for the virtual machine

allowedSourceAddressPrefix.Description: Mutually exclusive with the "allowedSourceAddressPrefixes" parameter. Should be an IP address or CIDR, for example "192.168.0.3" or "192.168.0.0/16".

endTimeUtc.Description: The date & time at which the request ends in UTC

statusReason.Description: A description of why the `status` has its value

mappedPort.Description: The port which is mapped to this port's `number` in the Azure Firewall, if applicable

enforcementMode.Description: The enforcement mode of the group. Can also be defined per collection type by using ProtectionMode

protectionMode.Description: The protection mode of the group per collection type. Can also be defined for all collection types by using EnforcementMode

properties.Description: Represents a VM/server group and set of rules that are Recommended by Microsoft Defender for Cloud to be allowed

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

exe.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

msi.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

script.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

executable.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

configurationStatus.Description: The configuration status of the VM/server group or machine or rule on the machine

recommendationAction.Description: The recommendation action of the VM/server or rule

resourceId.Description: The full azure resource id of the machine

enforcementSupport.Description: The VM/server supportability of Enforce feature

action.Description: The recommendation action of the VM/server or rule

type.Description: The type of the rule to be allowed

publisherInfo.Description: Represents the publisher information of a process/rule

common.Description: Whether the path is commonly run on the machine

fileType.Description: The type of the file (for Linux files - Executable is used)

configurationStatus.Description: The configuration status of the VM/server group or machine or rule on the machine

publisherName.Description: The Subject field of the x.509 certificate used to sign the code, using the following fields -  O = Organization, L = Locality, S = State or Province, and C = Country

productName.Description: The product name taken from the file's version resource

binaryName.Description: The "OriginalName" field taken from the file's version resource

version.Description: The binary file version taken from the file's version resource

username.Description: Represents a user that is recommended to be allowed for a certain rule

recommendationAction.Description: The recommendation action of the VM/server or rule

enforcementMode.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the VM/server group

protectionMode.Description: The protection mode of the collection/file types. Exe/Msi/Script are used for Windows, Executable is used for Linux.

configurationStatus.Description: The configuration status of the VM/server group or machine or rule on the machine

recommendationStatus.Description: The recommendation status of the VM/server group or VM/server

sourceSystem.Description: The source type of the VM/server group

issue.Description: An alert that VMs/servers within a group can have

numberOfVms.Description: The number of machines in the VM/server group that have this alert
